Creators Andreas Heckmann. Arne Nolting. Jan Martin Scharf

Directed by Barbara Eder. Stefan Ruzowitzky. Steve Saint Leger. Lennart Ruff

Written by Andreas Heckmann. Arne Nolting. Jan Martin Scharf. Jason George. Kseniya Melnik

Cast Laurence Rupp( Arminius11 episodes, 2020-2022 ). Jeanne Goursaud( Thusnelda11 episodes, 2020-2022 ). David Schütter( Folkwin Wolfspeer / …10 episodes, 2020-2022 ). Florian Schmidtke( Talio10 episodes, 2020-2022 ). Bernhard Schütz( Segestes8 episodes, 2020-2022 ). Jeremy Miliker( Ansgar8 episodes, 2020-2022 ). Eva Verena Müller( Irmina7 episodes, 2020-2022 ). Sophie Rois( Seeress Runa7 episodes, 2020-2022 ). Gaetano Aronica( Varus7 episodes, 2020-2022 ). Sergej Onopko( Hadgan6 episodes, 2020-2022 ). Daniel Donskoy( Flavus6 episodes, 2022 ). Nikolai Kinski( Pelagios5 episodes, 2020 ). Matthias Weidenhöfer( Golmad5 episodes, 2020 ). Murathan Muslu( Marbod5 episodes, 2022 ). Alessandro Fella( Germanicus5 episodes, 2022 ). Giovanni Carta( Tiberius5 episodes, 2022 ). Brittany Falardeau( Thusnelda5 episodes, 2020 ). William Champion( Pelagios5 episodes, 2020 ). David Wurawa( Dido’s Father4 episodes, 2022 ). Nicki von Tempelhoff( Reik Segimer4 episodes, 2020 ). Ilknur Boyraz( Runa4 episodes, 2022 ). Denis Schmidt( Rurik4 episodes, 2020 ). Finn Reiter( Young Arminius4 episodes, 2020 ). Gabriele Rizzoli( Gaius4 episodes, 2022 ). Cynthia Micas( Dido4 episodes, 2022 ). Katharina Heyer( Odarike4 episodes, 2022 ). Robert Maaser( Odvulf4 episodes, 2022 ). Alex Fernandez( Golmad4 episodes, 2020 ). Laila Berzins( Runa4 episodes, 2020 ). Ronald Zehrfeld( Berulf3 episodes, 2020 ). Arved Birnbaum( Aldarich3 episodes, 2020 ). Pilát Márk( Tanno3 episodes, 2020 ). Soma Danhauser( Centurion Maximus3 episodes, 2020 ). Gergo Kun( Vala – Legate3 episodes, 2020 ). Dániel Hernádi( Eggius – Legate3 episodes, 2020 ). Mathis Landwehr( Eigil3 episodes, 2020 ). Marlon Boess( Luco3 episodes, 2020 ). Ugo De Cesare( Titus3 episodes, 2022 ). Wolfram Kunkel( Reik Brandolf3 episodes, 2022 ). Liza Seneca( Irmina3 episodes, 2020 ). László Demény( Claudius2 episodes, 2020 ). Andrea Garofalo( Aulus3 episodes, 2022 ). Diego Riace( Quintus – Tribune2 episodes, 2020 ). Valerio Morigi( Metellus – Centurion2 episodes, 2020 ). Sebastian Griegel( Hanno2 episodes, 2020 ). Urs Rechn( Kunolf the Brukteer2 episodes, 2020 ). Sinha Melina Gierke( Raskild2 episodes, 2020 ). Roland Tzafetás( Bructeri Rat2 episodes, 2020 ). Zsolt Zágoni( Wounded Legionary2 episodes, 2020 ). Marta Abramczyk( Ine2 episodes, 2022 ). Wladyslaw Kita( Reik Gudmunt2 episodes, 2022 ). Brian McNamara( Reik Segimer2 episodes, 2020 ). Michael McShane( Aldarich2 episodes, 2020 ). Cathy Cavadini( Lifana2 episodes, 2020 ). Aaron Hendry( Berulf2 episodes, 2020 ). Jeff LeBeau( Rurik2 episodes, 2020 ). Patrick Wenk-Wolff( Talio2 episodes, 2020 ). Colin Pickard( Ansgar2 episodes, 2020 ). Justin Lawrence Barnes( Hanno2 episodes, 2020 ). Davide Tucci( Septimus2 episodes, 2022 ). Kamil Lemie( Roman Butcher / …2 episodes, 2022 ). Aaron Friesz( Gero2 episodes, 2022 ). Borys Solek( Dagr2 episodes, 2022 ). Csilla Bakonyi( Lifana1 episode, 2020 ). Daniel Kaszas( Young Folkwin Wolfspeer1 episode, 2020 ). David Bredin( Vannius1 episode, 2022 ). Sergio Sivori( Officer Marcus1 episode, 2022 ). Ákos Balog( Flavus1 episode, 2020 ). Dajana Rajic( Young Thusnelda1 episode, 2020 ). Michal Chorosinski( Reik Thorleif1 episode, 2022 ). Anna Hay( German merchantess1 episode, 2020 ). Máté Hunyadi( Legionary #11 episode, 2020 ). Peter Moltzen( Wiborg1 episode, 2020 ). Andrea Rizzoli( Decanus Petronius1 episode, 2022 ). Tünde Nyilas( Ida1 episode, 2020 ). Benett Vilmányi( Chatti messenger1 episode, 2020 ). Viktor Sokorai( Chatti Warrior1 episode, 2020 ). Marc Ben Puch( Gernot Redbeard1 episode, 2020 ). István Czeti( Legionary1 episode, 2020 ). Dávid Vizi( Roman Gate Legionary #11 episode, 2020 ). Dániel Baki( Roman Gate Legionary #21 episode, 2020 ). Zsolt Dér( Auxiliary Soldier #11 episode, 2020 ). Dina Kabelitz( Ilfy1 episode, 2020 ). Mark Merán( Vegis1 episode, 2020 ). Tenz McCall( Vegis1 episode, 2020 ). Sarah Elmaleh( Raskild1 episode, 2020 ). Will Collyer( Luco1 episode, 2020 ). Ferenc Iván Szabó( Roman legionnaire1 episode, 2020 ). Zámbó István( Roman legionnaire1 episode, 2020 ). Bendegúz Varga( Roman Guard1 episode, 2020 ). Stefan Ruzowitzky(1 episode, 2022 ). Cynthia Carta( Dido1 episode, 2022 ). Zinaida Zagner( Manic Grandmother1 episode, 2022 ). Benedikt Kalcher( Young Arminius1 episode, 2022 ). Samuel Girardi( Young Flavus1 episode, 2022 ). Ilyes Raoul( Young Marbod1 episode, 2022 ). Maciej Kardas( Optio Sixtus1 episode, 2022 ). Sofia Koval( Young Dido1 episode, 2022 ). Patryk Brozoza( Marcomanni Scout1 episode, 2022 ). Attila Arpa( Marcus Caelusunknown episodes ). Iris Baumüller(unknown episodes )

Language German. Latin

Producers Andreas Bareiß. Marlow De Mardt. Sabine de Mardt. Rainer Marquass. Teresa Haberbusch. William Pruss. Adam Ruzsinszki. Jake Coburn. Stefan Ruzowitzky. Krzysztof Solek. Lukasz Szklarz. Sidonie Dumas. Christophe Riandee

Production Gaumont. Netflix.

Season 2

Total Episodes 6
